Text.Page:
Greedy members of the Free Traders and the Enlightened Union have been seen infiltrating our territory. Patrol the wilderness and encroachment areas. Make sure all is in order.

You're a talented .... Would you thin out the {@linkcreature:123#202#Darkquaver mugatos} and {@linkcreature:123#205#river ghilliedhus}, too? Much easier for my lookouts to track our enemies' movement.

One last thing before you go, this task requires cooperative effort; make a party and think of it as training. A party with someone of level 65 and someone not yet level 60 will earn my bonus reward.

Excellent, !

I can see better already.

For the Iron Order!
